definition: A universal greeting used in both formal and informal contexts.
An expression of regret or apology. 'Lemstrathma' is used for more serious offenses, while 'lemsan' is a casual version for minor social slips.
A polite phrase used to capture someone's attention, pass through a crowded space, or apologize for a minor interruption in a formal manner.
An adverb used to make a request more polite. 'Bles' is the shortened common form, while 'pozhalestonova' is the highly formal and traditional version.
Second-person singular pronoun used for addressing one individual directly. It is neutral and can be used in most social settings.
Third-person singular masculine pronoun used to refer to a male person or an entity identified as masculine.
Third-person singular feminine pronoun used to refer to a female person or an entity identified as feminine.
Third-person singular neuter pronoun used for objects, animals, or concepts that do not have a specific gender.
First-person plural pronoun representing a group that includes the speaker and at least one other person.
Third-person plural pronoun used to refer to two or more people or things previously mentioned or easily identified.
Second-person plural pronoun used when addressing a group of two or more people simultaneously.
A formal title of respect and honorific used to address or refer to a person of status or a stranger in a polite way, regardless of gender.
